General.Name: Equity Metals Corp
General.Description: Equity Metals Corporation engages in the acquisition, exploration, and development of mineral properties in Canada. The company explores for gold, silver, zinc, copper, and diamond ores. It owns a 100% interest in the Silver Queen property consists of 17 crown-granted and 45 tenure claims covering an area of 18, 851.76 hectares located in the Omineca Mining Division, near Owen Lake, British Columbia; 57.49% interest in the Monument Diamond property located on the south shore of Lac de Gras in the Northwest Territories; and 100% in Saskatchewan Silica Sand lease covering an area of 54 acres. The company was formerly known as New Nadina Explorations Limited and changed its name to Equity Metals Corporation in September 2019. Equity Metals Corporation was incorporated in 1964 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 1199 West Hastings Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6E 3T5
